main.name: Joshua Charley
main.occupation: Fullstack Developer | Data Analyst & Project Manager.
main.description: I code, build and deploy not limited to analyze, visualize, give report on Data or starting and delivering a successful project.
main.bio: Hi! I am Joshua!. I've been coding for over 5 years As a Full Stack self-taught software developer. I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their company's challenges. Aside from a developer and staring at a computer screen all day, I'm a competitive project manager. I taught myself project management through Google's Project Manager Prefesional certificate on Coursera. Although this might feel irrelevant to you but believe me, Project management has to do with everything tied to any project, from starting a project and closing a project. It may surprise you also as I have a skill in Data analysisðŸ˜Š. Yes, Data analysis through IBM as a self-taught data analyst.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch let's solve a tech problem

education.description: Google's Africa Developer Training Program  on Mobile Web Development

Vast knowledge on the Introduction to Data Analytics, Excel Basics for Data Analysis, Data Visualization and Dashboards with Excel and Cognos, Python for Data Science, AI & Development, Python Project for Data Science, Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python, Data Analysis with Python, Data Visualization with Python.
Equip with all the key skills and technical know-how to kickstart a Full-Stack Cloud Native Application Development. Guided by experts at IBM

Effective knowledge on the Foundations of Project Management, Project Initiation: Starting a Successful Project, Project Planning: Putting It All Together, Project Execution: Running the Project, Agile Project Management

testimonials.text: Joshua is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his problem solving skills really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Working with Joshua has been AWESOME, he makes coding React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
